title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Sgt. Stanley Marsh is trapped behind enemy lines. His only chance of survival is to sneak past the Bosnian guard who stands watch.  Sgt. Marsh knows it's now or never. He must make a run for it.  American base is only a few feet away.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Master thief, halt!  It will take more than your weak American weapons to destroy me!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Cartman, we shot your Bosnian fat ass!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah! You're dead!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I have Class 4 armor on, that, uh, ih-ih-

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: No, you don't!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: -special armor, that's impenetrable to American bullets.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dude! Every time we play Americans vs. Bosnians, you cheat!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah, Cartman, you suck! If you want to play Americans vs. Bosnians any more, you can just play with yourself!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: That's fine! I'd like playing with myself! I'll play with myself all day long! What?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Some distance away from Cartman

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well? Now what are we going to do?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Huh-I donno.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hi, Stan.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hi, Wendy.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Kyle, doesn't Bebe look pretty today?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I donno.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: She does. She looks very pretty.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stan, can I talk to you for a second? Stan, wouldn't it be fun if we fixed Kyle up with Bebe?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: No.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: If Bebe and Kyle were a couple, then we can invite them over to your clubhouse for dinner and play parlor games and have meaningful conversations and sip cognac by the fireplace.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: We could?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah, Stan.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: But dude, I don't have a clubhouse.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: You don't?? I thought all guys had clubhouses.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Just how many guys' clubhouses have you been in?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Back near the tree, Cartman is sitting on Kenny

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: El Commandant Cartman has ways of making you talk!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: (Heellp!!)

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stan, you have to build a clubhouse! Then all four of us can sit in it and play Truth or Dare!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Truth or Dare? Wow.  Come on, Kyle. We've got work to do.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: We do?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: We're gonna build a clubhouse. I have to ask my dad for help.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Did it work?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I think it did, Bebe. If all goes as planned, Kyle will be your new boyfriend.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I hope so Wendy. He's got such a hot ass.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: The Marsh house. Randy turns on the TV and ends up on Terrance and Phillip. They are in a church.

text: Hey, Phillip, pull my finger.

title: CLUBHOUSES

text: Hurgh-rrh. Waiwait, wait wait. Hrhrhrhrh. Aha! Hr-rhrh. Oh my! Yeee-aaa!  Hurh. Uhwaiwait. Ye-aauraah-  Caught you there!

title: CLUBHOUSES

text: Hey hey hey. What's goin' on, Rudy?

text: You think you're slick, you punkass blasphemous dope-fiend bitch! I had my jimmy whacked seven times last week! I'll bust a cap in yo nigga ass, shithole!

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: THE CARTMAN HOUSE. CARTMAN AND KENNY ARE LOOKING OVER THE CLUBHOUSE KIT CARTMAN HAS APPARENTLY ORDERED the Ewok Village 2000 Deluxe Club House Kit w/Elevator. It has a two-story design. Cartman is wearing a yellow hard hat, and Kenny is trying to get a better look at the blueprints

text: No, Kenny, you can't look! I'm the foreman!

text: (Well, why the fuck do I have to do everything while you stand around in the snow lookin-)

title: CLUBHOUSES

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: South Park Elementary. Class is now in session. Mr. Twig is still there

text: And so, children, today we're gonna focus on American history, right Mr. Twig?

text: I told you to never mention that name in my classroom again! Mr. Hat is a two-timin' whore! And now we all learn from Mr. Twig!

text: That is enough! Mr. Hat is gone, and he isn't coming back, and I don't wanna hear it! Anyway, children, lets turn our history textbooks to page 105, which should be right after page 104

So when you're ready, I want you to feel free to come to me with anything you might need, whether it's advice, or- just someone to play catch with. You can count on me.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay. We're done.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dude, I don't think this is very sturdy.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: It doesn't matter, dude. It only has to last long enough to play Truth or Dare. I'm gonna go get the girls.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: G'oh?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stanley, it's time to go!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Go where?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Your bastard father has visitation rights, and this is his time with you.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: But no! I have to get the girls to come-

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Come on, Stanley!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Weak!  Dad?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hey, Stanley, uuh, hop in.  Listen, Stanley, I I know all this change must be tough on you, but you know, your- your mother and I thought it'd be best for all of us if we'd split up.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: But I don't understand why we have to-

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well, hello, ladies.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hi, handsome. We're gonna be at Larry's Bar tonight.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I'm already there.  What were we talking about? Oh yeah. See, your mother and I still care about you and your sister. But we just don't like being around each other any more.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well, I don't like being around my sister anymore; does that mean I can leave her, too?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well, no, because you're a family! You just can't leave family; you have to stick with family, no matter what.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: But you and Mom are family; how come you can just split up?  You know what I think? I think that when you and Mom got married, you became family. And now that you are, you shouldn't be able to leave her anymore than I can leave my sister.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hoho, Stan, you're so young. You just don't get it.  Well, anyway, have a nice day.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What? That's it?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah. But I loved our time together. I hate to see it end. Go on, get out. You know that nothing is more important to me than you, right, Stan?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I gguess, but-

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stan's clubhouse. He and Kyle are inside looking out the window

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay, dude, the girls are gonna be here to play Truth or Dare any minute.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stan, if I didn't know you better, I would almost think you're doing this because you wanna play with girls.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: No way, dude! Don't be silly.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Come on, Wendy.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: We have to say "Truth" a couple of times before we say "Dare," right?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Right. Why?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Because if we don't, we'll seem too eager.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Too eager to what?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: To say "Dare," dumbass! Jeez.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hi, guys.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh, hi Wendy. What's up?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Don't you guys still wanna play "Truth or Dare"?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah! I mean, sure, whatever.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Then come on!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Remember, "Truth" the first couple of times.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Who wants to go first?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I will. Kyle?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Truth, or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Umm. Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dude!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: How about we give him Bebe?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Kiss Bebe on the lips!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What?!! Sick, dude, I'm not kissing a girl!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What's the matter, Kyle?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: It's just wrong, that's all.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Don't be a chicken, dude. Just close your eyes.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What the hell have you gotten me into?!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dude, Cartman is in his clubhouse playing Truth or Dare with girls right now. You really want him to beat us?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hoh boy.  Sick!  Aaaaah! Fucking sickening!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Wow, look at that ass! Shake it, baby!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Your turn, Bebe.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay, Stan. Truth or Dare?  Stan, Truth or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dare.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Son, could you please help me with the firewood?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dude, we cut firewood all day yesterday! We have enough to last twelve years!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: When will you let me in?! Let me love you?! Now, get your ass out here and help me!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Bye, Stan. Hopefully we can play Truth or Dare tomorrow.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Crap!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Cartman's clubhouse. Meaningful discussions are taking place

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I think you should be able to move out legally when you're fourteen.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Our moms won't even let us smoke.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah, it's my body. My mom always gives me shit for smoking, but it's my body. I should be able to do whatever I want with it.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Totally. Uuuuuh my mom gives me shit sometimes, and I tell her to shut her hole before I kick her in the nuts!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Eric, snookums! it's time for Mommy to tuck you into your snuggleboat for night-night!  Eric? Are you out there in your clubhouse?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Coming, Mom.  Okay, we have to play Truth or Dare, quick!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hey, girls.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What's up.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh hey, Scott.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Who the hell are you?!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Uhwe invited some people over. Hope you don't mind.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: How many people?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: The bus stop, next day. Kyle is alone, and Bebe walks up

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Kyle, can I talk to you?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Kyle, this is very difficult for me. I think we need time apart.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Huh?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I'm just feeling really trapped. I can't go on with this codependency.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay, that's fine.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: No, no. Don't speak. Just try and understand. It has to be this way.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: But I don't care.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Please. Just remember the good times we have. I'll never forget you. Never. Okay, Clyde, we can go now.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Bitchin'.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: The Marsh house. Roy is looking at a home decorating show. Stan comes in

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: These are café curtains that require no sewing, and I know you all love that!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Do you mind if I watch cartoons? I've had a rough day.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Nnuuhunuuhh.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Chores. Do chores.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: My dad lets me watch cartoons.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well I'm not your dad. Okay? I'm NOT your dad! You jyou can't just go around playing games with my emotions.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stanley, what did you do to Roy?!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Roy's a dick! He ruined my chances with Wendy in the clubhouse!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stanley, you know you're the most imprtant thing to me, right?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: If that's true, then get back together with Dad for me!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Now Stanley, you have to understand how divorce works. When I say, "you're the most imprtant thign to me," what I mean is, you're the most important thing after me and my happiness and my new romances.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Bye now. Roy!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Divorce is stupid!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Heeyy heeyy heeyy! Hey Yolanda. Why is your eye all black and blue and shit?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Maaan, Fat Abbot. My stepdad popped me in my eye.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stepdad? You gotta off his ass!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Really?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah, bitch! Snatch his ass in a bear trap! Leave that motherfucker swingin' from a tree so high nobody finds him for days! Glock-glock, you know what I'm sayin'? Dumbassed motherfucker pullin' shit! Damn!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: You're right, Fat Abbot. Thanks!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: No problem, ho. Maybe later you can suck my dick, bitch-ho! Shit!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well, Fat Abbot and the gang sure done learned somethin' today. If you have a stepdad ridin' your ass, just snatch his ass in a bear trap. Grine! No more stepdad. See ya next time eatin' the pudding.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yeah. Yeah, I think I'll write a little note for Roy!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Cartman's clubhouse, that night. The place is jumping. Music is blaring and a small crowd mills around the clubhouse. The long-haired teenager, standing next to the radio, passes out. Cartman brings a tray holding a box and bowl of Cheesy Poofs

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hey, kid! Give me some of those!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hey! When are we gonna play Truth or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What? That game's for kids.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: This is bullcrap!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh boy, it's getting late. I'm gonna have to leave this party.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: This sucks, Kenny! I wish we'd never built a clubhouse!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: MOSH PIT!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: (Huh?)

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh my God, they killed Kenny!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: You bastard!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: The Marsh house

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Stanley?! Your father is coming over for visitation! Stan?  Meet me in the clubhouse.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Sharon? Sharon, have you seen my copy of Harper's?  Meet me at the clubhouse.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: In the clubhouse. Randy is alone there

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh, Randy. What are you doing here?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Iii-uuh got a note from Stanley to come out to the-uh clubhouse.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh I thought that note was for me.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh, maybe it was.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well, it looks like our little Stanley has built himself quite a clubhouse here.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: I remember not too long ago we were just kids playing kissing games in my clubhouse.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Goodnight.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Sharon?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Yes?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Truth or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: It's too late for games.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: No, I'm serious, please. Truth or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Truth.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Do you still love me?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Oh, Randy, I do love you, but- now I'm so confused-uh. I'm living with Roy and-, I don't know how to break it off with him.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Sharon-  Guh-ow! Uh. Ey! Uh.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Well, you never know. Maybe-

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: He-

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: -thing will work out.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hello?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Maybe. I guess it's my turn. Truth or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Sharon?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dare.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Do me. Right here in the clubhouse!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hello? Hel-lo? Could- could somebody get me d-? Hello?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Wow. Clubhouses are magical.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Next day, back at the clubhouse. Stan, Wendy, and Bebe are there. So is Clyde

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Okay. It's my turn. Stan? Truth or Dare?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Dare.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Take this stick and jam it up your peehole.

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: What?!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Wow, that sucks!

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Do you think it'll hurt?

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: End of Clubhouses. Roy is still dangling from the tree outside

title: CLUBHOUSES
text: Hello? I sure am hungry. Anybody? It certainly does suck right here. Hello? Shuh- Sharon? Sharon, hello?
